short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code for any link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ditch the Copy & Paste: Share Websites Instantly with QR Codes!
Struggling to share long website URLs? Introducing "QR Link", your one-click solution for generating QR codes of any webpage you visit in Chrome!

QR Link makes sharing websites effortless:

Instant QR Codes: Click the extension icon and bam! A QR code for the current website pops up, ready to share.
Seamless Integration: Share the QR code directly on social media, messaging apps, or email - all within the extension.
Offline Friendly: No internet connection? No problem! Generate QR codes even on websites without an active connection.
Multiple Download Options: Choose between high-resolution PNG or SVG formats for optimal use.
Lightweight & Fast: Runs smoothly in the background without impacting your browsing speed.
QR Link empowers you to:

Simplify Link Sharing: Ditch lengthy URLs! Share restaurants, articles, products, and more with a quick QR code scan.
Boost Engagement: Integrate QR codes into flyers, posters, or business cards to drive traffic from offline to online.
Go Paperless: Reduce paper waste and eliminate the need for printed materials. QR codes are the eco-friendly way to share!
Increase Accessibility: Make your website accessible to everyone, including those who prefer a visual way to access information.
Make sharing websites a breeze. Install QR Link today!

Key points to remember:

Focus on the core functionality: This extension generates QR codes for the active website.
Highlight ease of use: One-click generation and sharing options ensure a smooth user experience.
Emphasize offline capability: This sets QR Link apart from competitors requiring internet access.
Benefits for users: Explain how QR Link simplifies sharing and increases website accessibility.
Strong call to action: Encourage users to install the extension with clear benefits.
